pilots.name: Shadow Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: Shadow Squadron has served since the early days of the Clone Wars, winning victories at Kadavo and against the flagship of Grievous, Malevolence.

shipAbility.name: Plated Hull
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result.

pilots.name: Anakin Skywalker

shipAbility.name: Plated Hull
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Hero of the Republic
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1 or in your [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 stress token.

pilots.name: R2-D2
pilots.caption: Bucket of Bolts

shipAbility.name: Plated Hull
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result.

pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your [Rear Arc], gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.name: “Odd Ball”

shipAbility.name: Plated Hull
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: CC-2237
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], you may acquire a lock on that ship.

pilots.name: “Matchstick”

shipAbility.name: Plated Hull
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Shadow Two
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary or [Single Turret Arc] attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each red token you have.

pilots.name: “Broadside”

shipAbility.name: Plated Hull
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Shadow Three
pilots.ability: While you perform a [Single Turret Arc] attack, if your [Single Turret Arc] indicator is in your [Left Arc] or [Right Arc], you may change 1 blank result to a [Focus] result.

pilots.name: “Goji”

shipAbility.name: Plated Hull
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Payload Specialist
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, it may roll 1 additional defense die for each friendly bomb at range 0-1 of it.

pilots.name: Red Squadron Bomber

shipAbility.name: Plated Hull
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if you are not critically damaged, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result.

pilots.text: At the battle of Geonosis, Red Squadron provided vital cover to the LAAT gunships deployed to secure the surface.
